headline: VERTEQ IPA VAPOR DRYER 200 MM
description: IPA Vapor Dryer    IPA 2800 is a drying system using isopropyl alcohol to provide a clean,dry surface on wafers and substrates System features a class 10 elevator,ultra-pure nitrogen loading environment, short load-to-vapor time and fast recovery between cycles The system is partical netural at 0.2 microns    This system is NOT a marangoni style
specstable:
Manufacturer Verteq
Model IPA 2800
Wafer Size Range
Maximum 200 mm
Cassettes per Load 2
Controller Type Microprocessor Controller Type
External Cooling Water Cooled
Other Information

System will process two cassetts of wafers or devices up to 8" in diameter
System sensors and safety features

  • Automatic and manual operation
  • IPA level sensor
  • IPA Supply low
  • Cooling water flow
  • Cooling water temp.
  • Exhaust air flow loss
  • N2 pressure loss
  • Air pressure loss
  • DI water flow
  • N2 flow loss
  • IPA leak detector
  • Purity limit
  • IPA Fluid temp.
  • Fire alarm (Ultra Violet)
  • Extremely low emissions and alcohol comsumption
    System consists of a dryer module and a auxiliary module
    Water cooling chiller and vacuum pump not included.
    Exhaust Requirements:
  • Vapor module: 100CFM@.25 static pressure (min)
  • Auxiliary module: 100CFM@.25 static pressure (min)
    Exhaust blowers not included
Power Requirements 208 V 40.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1995
Condition Very Good
Weight 1,305 lb (592 kg)
